metadata.name: Sprinting
metadata.description:
Monochrome photograph of an American bison (Bison bison) sprinting through Lamar Valley of Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming, USA. 

I noticed this bison walking through Lamar valley and decided put myself in its path about a half mile from where I spotted it. I sat down and waited. Once this bull was about 100 meters away he began to run, and continued running until he was well past me, allowing me to capture this dreamy image of an American icon.

1 of 1

6720x4480 pixels @300 PPI
